titles.title: Supporting the United States-Thailand alliance and urging the Government of Thailand to protect and uphold democracy, human rights, the rule of law, and rights to freedom of peaceful assembly and freedom of expression ahead of the 2023 general elections in Thailand, and for other purposes.

Supporting the United States-Thailand alliance and urging the Government of Thailand to protect and uphold democracy, human rights, the rule of law, and rights to freedom of peaceful assembly and freedom of expression ahead of the 2023 general elections in Thailand, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution urges the government of Thailand to (1) create conditions for fair elections; and (2) protect democracy, human rights, and the rule of law.
